title: Custom Software Development
problem: Off-the-shelf software doesn't fit your unique business processes, and building in-house is too slow and expensive.
solution: We architect and build custom applications designed specifically for your workflows, users, and growth trajectory.
description: Full-stack development from concept to deployment. We build web applications, mobile apps, and cloud-native systems that scale with your business.
approach: Deep discovery to understand business goals and technical constraints
Architecture design with scalability built in from day one
Agile sprints with continuous feedback and iteration
Production deployment with monitoring and support
outcomes: Architecture that scales to millions of users
Full IP ownership from day one
caseStudy: Built a health-tech platform that scaled from 10K to 500K users with zero downtime

title: Legacy Modernization
tagline: Transform technical debt into competitive advantage
problem: Your legacy system is slow, expensive to maintain, and blocking your ability to innovate and grow.
solution: We modernize your stack incrementally â€” no big-bang rewrites that risk your business continuity.

approach: Comprehensive audit of current architecture and pain points
Phased modernization roadmap with quick wins first
Gradual migration with parallel running systems

title: API & System Integration
problem: Your systems don't talk to each other, creating data silos, manual work, and errors.
solution: We build robust integrations that unify your tech stack and automate data flows across your organization.
description: Connect your platforms with third-party services, payment gateways, health devices, CRMs, and custom APIs.
approach: Map all integration requirements and data flows
Design secure authentication and error handling
Build real-time sync with comprehensive logging
Monitor, alert, and continuously optimize
techStack: Health: iHealth, Garmin, Fitbit, Google Fit, Dexcom, Withings
AI: OpenAI, Google AI, Hugging Face
caseStudy: Integrated 8+ health devices for a telemedicine platform serving 50K+ patients

title: Dedicated Engineering Teams
problem: Hiring takes months. Contractors are unreliable. You need senior engineering capacity now.
solution: Get a dedicated team of senior engineers who integrate with your workflows, tools, and culture within 48 hours.
description: Flexible engagement models from individual specialists to full product teams. All engineers have 8+ years experience.
approach: Match engineers to your tech stack and industry
48-hour onboarding to your tools and processes
Daily standups, weekly demos, monthly reviews
Scale up or down as your needs change
outcomes: Start building in 48 hours, not 3 months
No recruiter fees or HR overhead
caseStudy: Provided a 12-person team for a Series B startup that shipped 3 products in 18 months

title: Digital Marketing & Growth
problem: You're spending on marketing but can't connect it to revenue. Generic agencies don't understand your product.
solution: Data-driven marketing strategies executed by a team that understands software products and B2B buyer journeys.
description: Email marketing, SEO, paid acquisition, and content strategy designed specifically for software and tech companies.
approach: Audit current marketing stack and customer journey
Build automated email sequences that convert
SEO strategy focused on high-intent keywords
Paid campaigns with rigorous ROI tracking
channels: SEO: Technical audit, content strategy, link building
outcomes: Clear attribution from campaign to revenue
caseStudy: Grew email revenue from $0 to $50K/month for a SaaS company in 6 months
